title: Al-Shami
typeOfFood: Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In Lebanese cuisine you could find a variety of veg suitable items in cold and hot mezze such as hummus, chickpea salad, tabouleh, beans, stuffed grape leaves, falafel, and potatoes. Veg items are clearly marked. Also lots of meats. Operating since 1988.
